Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.description: You are now signed in to your dashboard.

hero.title: Streamline Your
hero.description: The all-in-one platform for managing construction documentation, photos, and project communication. Keep your team aligned and your projects on track.

features.title: Everything you need to manage construction projects
features.description: Powerful tools designed for construction professionals

photos.title: Photo Documentation
photos.description: Capture, organize, and share project photos with automatic metadata, location tagging, and AI-powered categorization.

zones.title: Zone Management
zones.description: Organize your projects by zones and sub-zones. Track progress across different areas with visual dashboards.

notes.title: Project Notes
notes.description: Keep detailed notes for every aspect of your project. Attach notes to specific photos, zones, or the overall project.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Invite team members, assign roles, and keep everyone in sync with real-time updates and notifications.

cta.title: Ready to transform your construction workflow?
cta.description: Join thousands of construction professionals who trust RenoSync Pro for their documentation needs.

Changelog.title: Changelog
Changelog.description: All notable changes to RenoSync Pro are documented here.
